DOC.brief_summary: To determine safety tolerability single oral dos HPN-100 formulation ( GT4P-F ) GT4P active pharmaceutical ingredient ( GT4P-API ) administer healthy male subject .
DOC.detailed_description: A randomized , open-label , four-treatment , four-period crossover study healthy male subject receive single dose follow four treatment four separate dosing day , 7 day apart : - Oral sodium phenylbutyrate ( Buphenyl® ) equivalent 3 g/m2 4-phenylbutyric acid ( PBA ) per dose - Oral GT4P-F mole equivalent 3 g/m2 PBA per dose - Oral GT4P-API mole equivalent 3 g/m2 PBA per dose - Intravenous 10 % sodium phenylacetate plus 10 % sodium benzoate ( Ammonul® ) 2.75 g/m2
